_source.short_desc: CoCounselor is a full service practice management solution to improve workflows, create documents, and view reports
_source.long_desc: The cloud-based law practice management solution created specifically for Plaintiff's Lawyers by Plaintiff's Lawyers! CoCounselor is more than just a Case Manager, it's a firm manager. Let CoCounselor manage your marketing, track case acquisition cost, run effortless reports, and much more.  CoCounselor allows you to go anywhere and still have access on any device. If you're a plaintiff's lawyer let us show you why CoCounselor is the only software for you and your clients!
_source.target_audience:
Plaintiff Attorneys
Personal Injury
Workers Compensation
Sexual Harassment
Criminal
Mass Torts

category_features.name: Billing & Invoicing
category_features.definition: Create and manage monetary interactions between parties (i.e. bills and invoices)

category_features.name: Calendar Management
category_features.definition: Create, manage, and share multiple calendars

category_features.name: Case Notes
category_features.definition: Access and track notes regarding case activities and updates within case files

category_features.name: Client Management
category_features.definition: Manage company interactions with current customers

category_features.name: Conflict Management
category_features.definition: Search and check for conflicts of interest/statutes of limitations

category_features.name: Contract/License Management
category_features.definition: Track, store, and access client/customer contracts

category_features.name: Docket Management
category_features.definition: Manage docket information and details associated to each court case to stay organized

category_features.name: Document Management
category_features.definition: Collect, upload, store, and share all documents in a centralized location making it easier for everyone involved to access information

category_features.name: Email Management
category_features.definition: Sort and organize large volumes of inbound emails.

category_features.name: Expense Tracking
category_features.definition: Detailed log and record of costs

category_features.name: Task Management
category_features.definition: A running list of action items and their respective status

category_features.name: Time Tracking
category_features.definition: Measure time to completion or hours worked

category_features.name: Trust Accounting
category_features.definition: Bookkeeping of client trust accounts

related_products.short_desc: Ranked #1, Clio is the leading legal case management software with the most 5-star reviews. Schedule a live demo to learn more.
related_products.features: Ranked #1, Clio is the leading legal case management software with the most 5-star reviews and the only legal software with over 1,000 reviews on Capterra. Clio is a cloud-based legal case management solution that lets you manage your law firm securely from anywhere. Access and manage your work in one central system - with matters, contacts, billing, and everything you need in one place. Schedule a live demo to learn more.

related_products.short_desc: Freshsales is packed with features and a highly intuitive UI so that you don't have to juggle multiple tools to run your business.
related_products.features: Freshsales is a full-fledged sales force automation solution for sales teams. It provides everything a salesperson needs to- attract quality leads, engage in contextual conversations, drive deals with AI-powered insights, and nurture customer relationships. With built-in email, phone, chat, and telephony, Freshsales empowers sales teams with more time for selling by automating the sales process and increases efficiency and productivity in their daily activities.

related_products.short_desc: Legal case management software for attorneys that's intuitive and easy to use. All your case files in 1 place. Try it free.
related_products.features: Join the HIGHEST RATED legal case management software on Capterra! See why tens of thousands of law firms in over 170 countries use PracticePanther to automate their workflows and get more done in less time. Never miss deadlines, get paid faster, seamlessly track billable time & expenses. Work from anywhere, on any device, with our mobile app. It's easy, user-friendly and intuitive. Now you can spend less time managing your firm and more time making money. Try it free, no credit card needed.

related_products.short_desc: MyCase is a top-rated, complete legal case management solution with all the tools firms need to run a better practice, from anywhere.
related_products.features: MyCase is a top-rated, end-to-end legal case management software that helps firms run efficiently from anywhere, provide an exceptional client experience, and easily track firm performance. Streamline day-to-day firm processes in one, easy to adopt solution -- lead tracking, client intake, case management, eSignature, billing, payments and more. Start your free trial (no credit card required) today!

related_products.short_desc: AbacusLaw is a turn-key, fully integrated Case Management Solution for firms of all sizes, in all practice areas and jurisdictions.
related_products.features: AbacusLaw gives you all the tools you need to grow your firm - including case management, time, billing, and full G/L accounting operations. Automatically capture critical case and client details, prevent important deadlines from falling through the cracks, and gain complete visibility into your practice.

related_products.short_desc: CosmoLex is the only cloud-based, total practice management, billing, and accounting system (no QuickBooks? required).
related_products.features: Thousands of law firms have switched to CosmoLex - the only cloud-based, law practice management software with built-in, compliant legal accounting (no QuickBooks needed). CosmoLex eliminates the struggle of juggling separate systems for law practice management, billing, and accounting. LawPay credit card processing is also built-in with no fixed monthly fee. Simply log into CosmoLex Cloud - anytime, anywhere - to get everything you need to run your entire law practice. Try free today!

related_products.short_desc: LEAP is a legal practice and case management software that allows firms to manage and store client and matter information in one place.
related_products.features: LEAP is a legal practice and case management software for small to medium sized law firms wishing to become more efficient, more productive and make more money. It allows you to manage and store all of your client and matter related information in one electronic file that can be accessed from your desktop computer or mobile device. Features include automatic time recording, pre-configured matter files for major areas of law and automation of client and matter data entry.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud-based legal practice management with all the tools you need to run a more productive and profitable law firm.
related_products.features: Run a more productive and profitable law firm from anywhere with Rocket Matter legal practice management. Trusted by thousands of attorneys for over 12 years for unparalleled product and service. Our intuitive cloud-based software has all the tools you need to become more automated, more profitable, and more on top of your business. Become a lean, modern, automated law firm with Rocket Matter. See it in action with a personalized walk-through. Or try us free for 15 days, no credit card required!

related_products.short_desc: Smokeball is a complete cloud-based legal practice management software built for PC?s. Manage your staff and entire firm in one place.
related_products.features: Smokeball cloud-based legal practice management software for PCs automatically records time and activity for you. Smokeball boasts full billing capability, an industry-leading document automation library with over 14,000 legal forms, Daily Digest, shared calendars, powerful integrations and a robust mobile app. Whether you bill hourly, fixed fee, or on contingency, Smokeball provides you the insights you need to run a more successful law firm.

related_products.short_desc: Practice Management software that integrates your information into a single system for improved efficiency and profitability.
related_products.features: Amicus Attorney is an intuitive case management solution that tracks and invoices billable time, automates important documents, and provides easy access to all your clients and case files. Work from your desktop or in the private cloud while integrating with QuickBooks and other applications.

related_products.short_desc: The #1 Most Customizable, Legal Case, Matter & Project Management Trusted by Over 50,000 Professionals. Get a Personalized Demo.
related_products.features: Filevine is the #1 most customizable legal case management software. Don't waste your valuable time on a free trial - Filevine is customized to how you do business and adapts to how your team evolves. Exceptional collaboration tools enable your team to focus on what matters, with automatic task assignments, easy reporting, texting, and emailing. Free, unlimited data storage in the cloud.   Soc 2 Type II certification ensures that your data is protected with the best security.

Best-in-class case management tools include built-in email, document management & automation, task management, CRM, secure client portal, calendar & more. The solution also includes sophisticated billing tools and complete business and trust accounting.

similar_products.short_desc: The Only Legal Cloud Built Exclusively For Plaintiff Personal Injury Law Firms
similar_products.features:
About CloudLex:

The leader in Personal Injury tech, CloudLex?, lets you take control of your practice from intake through closure & beyond with one comprehensive platform.

CloudLex's Next-Gen LegalCloud? designed exclusively for plaintiff Personal Injury law firms, helps you build, manage, and grow your practice with innovative apps that can be scaled to your needs.

Why CloudLex?

- Exclusively built for personal injury law firms
- Intuitive and easy to use
- All-inclusive and free support

similar_products.short_desc: Legal Files matter management is used by corporations, universities, governmental agencies and insurance companies.
similar_products.features: Legal Files has been in this business for 30+ years and knows what it takes for you to be successful. Government agencies, corporations, universities and insurance companies rely upon Legal Files to successfully organize workflows and manage operations. From centralizing and organizing your contacts, documents, emails, calendars, etc. to seamlessly integrating with Microsoft Outlook, Legal Files offers the latest technology to help you get the job done more efficiently and more efficiently.

similar_products.short_desc: Neos is ideal for legal case management thanks to its process automation, effective communication tools, and real-time analytics.
similar_products.features: Over 2,500 top law firms trust Assembly's solutions to optimize processes and maximize their bottom line. Our cloud-based solution, Neos, makes legal case management easier with real-time analytics, effortless payment capture, native intake, automated workflows, and more. Work together on documents with team members in real time. Generate multiple documents for hundreds of cases in a few clicks. Enjoy ready-to-use, customizable file templates. Leverage hundreds of integrations.

similar_products.short_desc: Cloud-based case management software for personal injury and mass tort law firms.
similar_products.features: CasePacer is a cloud-based case management software for personal injury and mass tort law firms. With secure, anywhere, anytime access, CasePacer helps firms streamline operations, communicate and collaborate with the right people and the right time, and capture, organize and track important case inputs, dates, contacts, expenses, and documents. Featuring built-in workflows and ticklers, an intuitive interface, a customer success team, and case-based pricing.

similar_products.short_desc: Designed to help you use proven case management best practices, so you don't need to reinvent the wheel.
similar_products.features:
Practice management is case management + business analytics.

Backdocket was designed to use proven case management best practices, so you don't need to reinvent the wheel. Backdocket then adds business analytics to your case management, so you can see what's making your firm successful.

Available at a competitive price, backdocket is also backed by a free demo as well as free tech support and free onboarding for new firms.

similar_products.short_desc: Get a OneStop Customer Portal to power your digital branch, engage with clients, and manage your firm - under your brand.
similar_products.features: Moxo powers OneStop Customers Portals, a virtual branch office where legal professionals can be responsive to their clients and manage cases from anywhere - under their brand. Your OneStop Customer Portal is the ultimate solution for securely exchanging messages, collaborating on documents, video meetings, digital signatures, transactions, and more - with a compliant, auditable ePaper trail.

similar_products.short_desc: CASEpeer is the only personal injury case management solution built for you, not by you.
similar_products.features:
CASEpeer online case management software is built for personal injury law firms. Easy to use, and easy to implement.

Designed for personal injury law firms, CASEpeer streamlines your practice from intake to settlement. Every account comes with ready-to-use reports and management screens, so you can make faster and smarter decisions.

Our law firms convert more leads, see better results, and have more insight into their cases. Maximize the potential of your attorneys and staff with CASEpeer.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Court Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Court Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Court Management software provides solutions for case management including docketing, workflow, calendar, concise case summaries, judicial assignments, and more. Court Management software is related to Legal Case Management software, Legal Document Management software, Law Practice Management software, and Legal Billing software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Electronic Discovery software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Electronic Discovery tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Electronic Discovery software, also known as eDiscovery software, enables companies to quickly and cost-efficiently retrieve information from a variety of sources including email, public folders, and company documents by performing searches across headers, body text, and various types of attachments. Many Electronic Discovery applications also provide email and file system archiving features. Electronic Discovery software is related to Law Practice Management software, Legal Case Management software and Legal Document Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Investigation Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Investigation Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Investigation Management software helps law enforcement agencies and other organizations in charge of security intake, plan and manage tasks across cases. These applications have features to manage recordkeeping, BOLO alerts, dispatching, citations, arrests and bookings. Investigation Management software is related to Law Enforcement software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Law Enforcement software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Law Enforcement tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Law Enforcement software enables public safety organizations to effectively manage investigations, reports and data. These applications provide a varied range of features adding utility and efficiency to law enforcement organizations, from dispatch and field communications tools to case management systems, incident database features, personal identifier tracking and patrol forecasting. Law Enforcement software is related to Jail Management software, Government software and Legal Case Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Law Practice Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Law Practice Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Law Practice Management software integrates and automates the front and back office activities of legal practices including: calendar management, appointment scheduling, case management, conflict checking, messaging, and more. These applications also often provide integrated solutions for time management, billing and collections as well as accounting. Law Practice Management solutions also provide tools for workflow and document management, marketing and inquiry tracking as well as distributing key data throughout the organization and across multiple office locations. Law Practice Management software is related to Legal Billing software, Legal Case Management software and Professional Services Automation software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Legal Billing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Legal Billing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Legal Billing software automates time tracking, billing, calendaring and accounting for law practices. These applications facilitate legal-style hourly billing and recording of case-related expenses. Many Legal Billing solutions also feature integration for a broad range of case and workflow management tools as well as accounting and payroll features across multiple office locations. Legal Billing software is related to Law Practice Management software, Professional Services Automation software and Time and Expense software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Legal Calendar software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Legal Calendar tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Legal Calendar software helps attorneys to manage their schedules. These applications allow users to schedule events and appointments, set deadline reminders and notifies of any conflicts. Legal Calendar software is related to Court Management software, Law Practice Management software, Legal Billing software and Legal Case Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Legal Document Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Legal Document Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Legal Document Management software allows legal professionals to organize and quickly access electronically-stored legal documents. Scanning, imaging, and merging allow these documents to be included in a database that is searchable and sortable in any number of ways. This type of software can also allow for transcript and transcription management. Legal Document Management software is related to Document Management software, Legal Case Management software, Law Practice Management software, and Court Management software.
